DataElement.preferredName: IWQOL-Lite 9 Past Week How True Troubled by Painful or Stiff Joints Score How True 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation in the past week about how true it is that they are troubled by painful or stiff joints, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Impact of Weight on Quality of Life-Lite Past Week How True Troubled by Painful or Stiff Joints Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 31-item, self-report questionnaire that utilizes a five-point rating scale to measure obesity-specific quality of life in adults. The assessment consists of a total score, as well as individual scores for each of five specific domains, including physical function, self-esteem, sexual life, public distress, and work._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's agreement with a statement._A question about whether an individual has or had trouble by painful or stiff joints._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I am troubled by painful or s
ReferenceDocuments.description: I am troubled by painful or stiff joints.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Impact of Weight on Quality of Life (IWQOL-Lite)
